policyDetails.name: PII data is written to the log files
policyDetails.description: Sensitive Data written to log files or file system may lead to unauthorized access or exposure to potential attack.
policyDetails.fix: It is not recommended to log Sensitive Data to log files or the file system. The data must be encrypted if it is absolutely necessary to log it.
